action.action-desc: Ms. Wasserman Schultz (for herself and Mr. Rutherford) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to transport an individual employed at a medical facility of the Department of Veterans Affairs between a parking facility and the medical facility.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans Priority Access to Reliable Care Act of 2017 or the Veterans PARC Act of 2017.

section.header: Transportation of an individual employed at a medical facility of the Department of Veterans Affairs between a parking facility and the medical facility
